snippet: Pierre Juhen, the owner of the Paris-based organic Patyka beauty line, has created new “airless” packaging for two face creams and two masks in the Biokaliftin (anti-aging) part of the line.
abstract: Pierre Juhen, the owner of the Paris-based organic Patyka beauty line, has created new “airless” packaging for two face creams and two masks in the Biokaliftin (anti-aging) part of the line.

headline.main: A Cleaner Cream? Paris-Based Line Tries "Airless" Jar
